scripts.bundle-cli: esbuild ./dist/cli/index.js --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --external:esbuild --outfile=dist/cli/bundle.cjs --main-fields=module,main --banner:js="import { createRequire as topLevelCreateRequire } from 'module'; const require = topLevelCreateRequire(import.meta.url); const __dirname = '__SET_BY_ESBUILD__';"
